self.name: messages.searchCounter
self.description: Indicates how many results would be found by a messages.search call with the same parameters
self.descriptionExcerpt: Indicates how many results would be found by a messages.search call with the same parameters

arguments.name: inexact
arguments.description: If set, the results may be inexact

arguments.name: count
arguments.description: Number of results that were found server-side

parent.name: messages.SearchCounter
parent.description: Number of results that would be returned by a search
